name: First Steps in Ashbee Realms
description: Learn the basics of adventuring in Ashbee Realms. Your journey begins here!

steps.title: Welcome, Adventurer!
steps.description: Welcome to Ashbee Realms! Let's get you started on your adventure.
steps.instruction: Click on your Character Sheet to view your stats and equipment.
steps.tip: Your character sheet shows your stats, equipment, and active effects. Check it often!

steps.title: Managing Your Inventory
steps.description: Learn how to manage items and equipment.
steps.instruction: Open your Inventory and view your starting gear.
steps.tip: You can equip, use, or sell items from your inventory. Rarity determines item quality!

steps.title: Equipping Gear
steps.description: Equip your starting weapon to increase your combat power.
steps.instruction: Equip your starting weapon from the inventory.
steps.tip: Better gear makes you stronger! Equipment affects your stats directly.

steps.title: Exploring the World
steps.description: Time to venture out and explore Ashbee Realms!
steps.instruction: Open the Map and travel to Whispering Woods.
steps.tip: Each location has different monsters, dangers, and rewards. Choose wisely!

steps.title: Your First Battle
steps.description: Encounter and defeat your first monster.
steps.instruction: Defeat a Forest Slime in combat.
steps.tip: Use Attack to deal damage. Watch your HP and use potions when needed!

steps.title: Collecting Loot
steps.description: Defeated monsters drop valuable items and gold.
steps.instruction: Collect loot from your defeated enemy.
steps.tip: Loot includes gold, items, and crafting materials. Don't leave treasure behind!

steps.title: Growing Stronger
steps.description: You've gained enough experience to level up!
steps.instruction: Reach Level 2 by gaining experience from combat.
steps.tip: Each level increases your stats and unlocks new abilities. Keep fighting to grow stronger!

steps.title: Accepting Quests
steps.description: Quests provide goals, rewards, and story progression.
steps.instruction: Open the Quest Log to see available quests.
steps.tip: Complete quests for extra XP, gold, and unique rewards!

steps.title: Trading with Merchants
steps.description: NPCs can buy your items or sell you new gear.
steps.instruction: Find and interact with a merchant NPC.
steps.tip: Merchants have different inventories. Some sell potions, others sell weapons or armor!

steps.title: Tutorial Complete!
steps.description: You've learned the basics! Your adventure truly begins now.
steps.instruction: Continue exploring, fighting monsters, and completing quests!
steps.tip: You're ready to explore dungeons, join raids, and become a legend. Good luck!

completion_message: Congratulations! You've completed the tutorial and earned the title 'Novice Adventurer'. The world of Ashbee Realms awaits your exploration!
